name: 90% Raised
subject: Used to notify that 90% of campaign's target amount has been raised
html_content:
1. Campaign Name --> %{campaign.name}%

2. Target Amount --> %{campaign.target-amount}%

3. Amount Raised --> %{campaign.raised-amount}%

4. Campaign Start --> %{campaign.start-date}%

5. Campaign End --> %{campaign.end-date}%

6. Campaign Link --> %{campaign.link}%
